original_title: Weezer: OK Human Live with the L.A. Philharmonic + Y.O.L.A.
overview: Weezer invites each and every one of you to stare at your screens while they perform OK Human for the first time ever (along with all your favorite Weezer songs).
title: Weezer: OK Human Live with the L.A. Philharmonic + Y.O.L.A.
